fn.p: Funding. This work was supported by Ducks Unlimited Canada, The Community Foundation of Utah, U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service, Utah Department of Environmental Quality, Utah Agricultural Experiment Station, Friends of the GSL, USU Research and Graduate Studies, Utah State University Ecology Center, The Society of Wetland Scientists, Utah Wetlands Foundation, the Intermountain West Joint Venture, The Utah Division of Wildlife Resources, Utah Division of Forestry, Fire & State Lands, Kennecott Utah Copper, The Salt Institute, U.S. Environmental Protection Agency, The Wetland Foundation, Delta Waterfowl, Southshore Wetlands and Wildlife Management Inc., and The Utah Waterfowl Association. This research was supported by the Utah Agricultural Experiment Station, Utah State University, and approved as journal paper number 9125.
